_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three people found in the world [an3: A person like a line drawn in stone
A person like a line drawn in sand
A person like a line drawn in water
Characteristics of a person like a line: Anger lingers for a long time
Stays in touch, interacts with, and greets someone who speaks to them in a rough, harsh, and disagreeable manner.
